Text: UHY Hacker Young said the rapid growth of the causal-dining sector since the 2008 financial crisis had resulted in an oversaturated mid-market, which is still going through a dramatic shakeout. The research found that hundreds of small independent restaurants had collapsed as well as big chains such as those owned by the celebrity chef Oliver. More than 1,400 UK restaurants collapsed in 2018-19  The crisis in the restaurant sector has been presented as a problem only for the chains that had lost touch with their customers, Peter Kubik, a partner at UHY Hacker Young, said.
Cause: UHY Hacker Young said the rapid growth of the causal-dining sector since the 2008 financial crisis had resulted in an oversaturated mid-market, which is still going through a dramatic shakeout.
Effect: More than 1,400 UK restaurants collapsed in 2018-19  The crisis in the restaurant sector has been presented as a problem only for the chains that had lost touch with their customers, Peter Kubik, a partner at UHY Hacker Young, said.
Sentence: <e1>UHY Hacker Young said the rapid growth of the causal-dining sector since the 2008 financial crisis had resulted in an oversaturated mid-market, which is still going through a dramatic shakeout.</e1> The research found that hundreds of small independent restaurants had collapsed as well as big chains such as those owned by the celebrity chef Oliver. <e2>More than 1,400 UK restaurants collapsed in 2018-19  The crisis in the restaurant sector has been presented as a problem only for the chains that had lost touch with their customers, Peter Kubik, a partner at UHY Hacker Young, said.</e2>
